review_blob: 330 ml bottle. Lovely aroma of roasted malt, nuts, dark chocolate, tobacco. The taste !!! Wow! This is what it should be. Dry, bitter, sweet. Big, rich body. Several amazing flavors, coffee, fudge, grilled marshmallow, brown sugar and some fruitiness. Awsome Porter this!

Great Baltic Porter, unique in Portugal

appearance - dark
aroma - dryed grapes
flavors - complex, different layers of malt.
body - goog body
nice to pai with desserts
